original_text: Jesus said, ‘If your Christian friend has done something wrong against you, you must go and speak to him. When you are alone with him, tell him what he has done that is wrong. He may agree with what you say. If he does, then you can call him your friend again.
korean_text: 네 형제가 죄를 범하거든 가서 너와 그 사람과만 상대하여 권고하라 만일 들으면 네가 네 형제를 얻은 것이요

sentences.original_text: If your Christian friend has done something wrong against you
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신의 기독교인 친구가 당신에게 잘못한 일이 있다면

sentences.original_text: you must go and speak to him
When you are alone with him
tell him what he has done that is wrong
He may agree with what you say
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신의 말에 동의할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: then you can call him your friend again
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 당신은 그를 다시 친구라고 부를 수 있습니다
